about_the_game:
WELCOME TO CHASEMASTER !



Chasemaster is an urban driving game where you embark on a mission assigned by your agency. Your objective is to swiftly locate and retrieve all seven hidden Data Cards scattered throughout the city, while carefully maneuvering your car to avoid any collisions that could end the exhilarating police pursuit. Utilize a sophisticated strategy and make timely decisions to outwit the pursuing police unit and safely return to your city. Ensure the preservation of your car as you transport the cards back to your agency headquarters. Strive to achieve quick completion times, establish personal records, and share your scores with both us and your friends. Immerse yourself in the immersive world of a comprehensive driving, racing, and chase game presented by Duelator Games.
detailed_description:
WELCOME TO CHASEMASTER !



Chasemaster is an urban driving game where you embark on a mission assigned by your agency. Your objective is to swiftly locate and retrieve all seven hidden Data Cards scattered throughout the city, while carefully maneuvering your car to avoid any collisions that could end the exhilarating police pursuit. Utilize a sophisticated strategy and make timely decisions to outwit the pursuing police unit and safely return to your city. Ensure the preservation of your car as you transport the cards back to your agency headquarters. Strive to achieve quick completion times, establish personal records, and share your scores with both us and your friends. Immerse yourself in the immersive world of a comprehensive driving, racing, and chase game presented by Duelator Games.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 Architecture
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-Capable Intel or AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur 11 +
  • Processor: x64 Architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Recent Intel or AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Chasemaster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x64 or x86 architecture
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A perfect blend of adventure, racing, strategy and speed. Chasemaster is all about completing your mission and escaping the city to your agency safely. Make quick decisions, outplay the police and get back safely!
